sentence.Network_en: The new regulations will not make an appreciable difference to most people.
sentence.Network_cn: 新的规定对大多数人将无大影响。

sentence.Network_en: We bought an appreciable piece of property.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们买下的资产有增值的潜力.

sentence.Network_en: There is no appreciable distinction between the twins.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这对孪生子之间看不出有什么明显的差别.

means.word_mean: 数量可观的,确实的,显然的

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French appréciable, from apprécier (see appreciate)

entry.tran: 可觉察的；相当大的；明显的
entry.def: An appreciable amount or effect is large enough to be important or clearly noticed.

example.ex: It contains less than 1 per cent fat, an appreciable amount of protein, and a high content of minerals...
example.tran: 它所含脂肪不到1%，富含蛋白质，矿物质含量也很高。

example.ex: This has not had an appreciable effect on production.
example.tran: 此事未对生产造成显著影响。

means.word_mean: 1. enough to be estimated or measured;

sentences.sentence: "appreciable amounts of noxious wastes are dumped into the harbor"

auth_sentence.content: When you do that you find the cost is appreciable.
auth_sentence.res_content: When you do that you find the cost is appreciable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When you do that you find the cost is appreciable.

auth_sentence.content: Here some appreciable rainfall occurs in all months.
auth_sentence.res_content: Here some appreciable rainfall occurs in all months.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Here some appreciable rainfall occurs in all months.

auth_sentence.content: How much would be enough to make an appreciable difference to growth?
auth_sentence.res_content: How much would be enough to make an appreciable difference to growth?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How much would be enough to make an appreciable difference to growth?

stems_affixes.word_buile: ap加强+preci价值,估价+able能……的→adj.可估价的;可察觉的
depreciate[v.贬低,贬值]+ion表名词→n.折旧,价值下降
ap一再+preci价值+ate表动词→一再给价→欣赏
de去掉+preci价值,估价+ate表动词→去掉价值→贬值

means.word_mean: 可预见的, 可估计的

sentences.en: I can find no appreciable differences in the witnesses’ descriptions of the accident, they seem the same.
sentences.cn: 在我看来, 证人们对事故的描述没有什么明显的区别, 都是一样的。

sentences.en: We bought an appreciable piece of property.
sentences.cn: 我们买下的资产有增值的潜力。
